data.title: Nicole Kidman Height Weight Bra Size Body Measurements Vital Statistics
data.meta_description: Actress Nicole Kidman Height Weight Bra Size Body Measurements Vital Statistics and details of her shoe size, age, hair eye color, family ethnicity, and facts are discussed.
data.text:
Nicole Mary Kidman is an Australian actress and film producer born on 20 June 1967. She began her acting career with the film Bush Christmas. Nicole received a breakthrough from the film Dead Calm and international fame and success from the movie Days of Thunder. Afterward, Kidman worked in numerous movies including Batman Forever, Moulin Rouge, The Hours, To Die For, and The Paperboy. As an actress, Nicole has won several awards such as Golden Globe Award, Academy Award, and the BAFTA Award. In addition to that, Nicole has served as the Goodwill representative for UNIFEM and UNICEF. Kidman also joined the Little Tee Campaign for breast cancer care to design T-shirts to raise money to fight against this disease. Recently, she has become the brand ambassador for Etihad Airways.

Being a producer, Nicole established and owns a production company named Blossom Films. In her personal life, Nicole Kidman has been married twice so far. Her first marriage was with actor Tom Cruise, and she is now married to country singer Keith Urban. She has four children of whom two are adopted.
